issue.title: [Docs] Link to cookbook from main docs site
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13667](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13667). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Now that the cookbook is hosted at https://arrow.apache.org/cookbook/ it can be linked to from the main docs

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13667?focusedCommentId=17404536) by Alessandro Molina (amol-):*
Being tackled in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10999 as part of another issue
